summary: After freeing helpers in Arkham, Freeze and Penguin freeze down Gotham City and attack with huge monsters. Batman responds, helped by other heroes.
cast: Roger Craig Smith|Oded Fehr|Lucien Dodge|Dana Snyder|Chris Diamantopoulos|Phil LaMarr|Will Friedle|Charlie Schlatter|Carlos Alazraqui|John DiMaggio|Dave B. Mitchell|Troy Baker|Alastair Duncan|Janell Cox|Richard Epcar
